data.author: George Orwell
data.quote: If liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Life is tough but so are you.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Everyday may not be good but there is something good in everyday.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Be the reason someone smiles today.

data.author: Farrah Gray
data.quote: Comfort is the enemy of achievement.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: Luck is where opportunity meets preparation.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.

data.author: Oberyn Martell
data.quote: Today is not the day I die.

data.author: James Bond
data.quote: I don't stop when I am tired, I stop when I am done.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: Rhetoric is the art of ruling the minds of men.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: Philosophy is the highest music.

data.author: Socrates
data.quote: All men's souls are immortal, but the souls of the righteous are immortal and divine.

data.author: Dr. Suess
data.quote: You have to be odd to be number one.

data.author: Iroh
data.quote: Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.

data.author: Iroh
data.quote: It is usually best to admit mistakes when they occur, and to seek to restore honor..

data.author: Iroh
data.quote: Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.

data.author: Mae West
data.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
